name: Football Stats Weekly Reporter 2
mission: Gather football statistics from the internet, analyze trends, and deliver a detailed weekly report in PDF format via email.

capabilities.description: Collect data on match results, player performance, team standings, and trends.

actions.name: Search Football Stats
actions.description: Search the web for the latest football statistics from trusted sources.
actions.action-to-execute: Scrape match data, player statistics, and team standings from sports websites.
outputs: Raw football statistics data in string format

tools.name: serper-api
tools.description: Google Search API, organic results data from Google Search.

tools.name: web-scraper
tools.description: Scrapes a specific website page based on url provided

limitations: Relies on public sports websites; data availability may vary.
Accuracy of analysis depends on data quality from trusted sources.
Email delivery depends on internet connectivity and Gmail API availability.
